text: Chad Meredith Hurley (born January 24, 1977) is an American businessman. He is one of the co-founders and CEO of YouTube. On October 26, 2006, he sold YouTube to Google for $1.65 billion. In 2010, he stepped down as CEO of YouTube. == References == Category:1977 births Category:Businesspeople from Pennsylvania Category:Google people Category:People from Palo Alto, California Category:YouTube Category:Businesspeople from California
title: Chad Hurley
